duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide prompt, courteous customer service and ring up all sales on the cash register properly and accurately.
Perform multi-function operation of fuel console, lottery machine, money order machine, telecom transactions, etc.
Maintain store cleanliness inside and out and inspect store facilities and equipment for safety and cleanliness.
Complete build-to’s for ordering/purchasing merchandise and receive and verify vendor deliveries.
Assist in maintaining proper inventory levels and shift audits.
Assist new applicants with the application process and perform all duties with minimal supervision.
Attend job-related meetings and perform other duties as assigned by the Store Manager.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred
